text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In every era, in every corner of the<n>world, there is always
one person<n>who stands head and shoulders<n>above their
peers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, this maxim<n>remains ever constant.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And crossing the finish line in first<n>place, leagues ahead of
the<n>competition, is Symboli Rudolf! What a<n>performance!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Phew... Victory secured. I'm on the<n>right track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Promising new racers are gathered<n>here at the tryouts,
eager to prove<n>themselves to prospective trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But... Symboli Rudolf has won by such<n>an insurmountable
lead, her poor<n>rivals pale in comparison.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She even outshadowed her own<n>personal best. The sheer
power she<n>demonstrated left all of us<n>dumbfounded.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To all in the stands, allow me to<n>extend my gratitude. Your
cheers of<n>encouragement led me to this victory.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And to you, trainers: did my<n>performance today satisfy your<n>
expectations?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I realize that I still have far to travel in<n>my journey to the top,
and I leave<n>much room for improvement.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To that end, I seek a comrade in arms<n>who will march this
imperial path with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If you share my vision, I implore you<n>to put your name
forward.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Th-that's easier said than done.<n>She's clearly talented
beyond belief,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah... If her trainer is unable to<n>guide her to victory... their
reputation<n>will be shredded.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They're not wrong. From a trainer's<n>perspective, taking on
a runner like<n>Symboli Rudolf is a huge risk.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end, no one can muster the<n>courage to put
themselves in the<n>running, and we all disperse.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Steady, now... One last push!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
With the homestretch ahead of her,<n>Symboli Rudolf picks up
speed, leaving<n>her competitors lagging behind!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's unstoppable! Her reign is<n>absolute! We're seeing a
run worthy<n>of the Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter how hard I try, I can't get<n>Symboli Rudolf's
overwhelmingly<n>powerful strides out of my mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Needless to say, sleep doesn't come<n>easily to me that night.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day, I head to the training<n>grounds.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, a trainer... I remember seeing you<n>at the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You were at the race, and now<n>you've come to speak to me
directly.<n>May I presume you're here to scout<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Then I've but one question for you:<n>why do you wish to be
my trainer?
choice_data_list: I want to see more of your running.
I want to see more of your running.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm, I see. "More of my running," you<n>say. I suppose that
means you see<n>future potential in me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
For your reference, you're the third<n>trainer I've had this
conversation with.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The first spoke of his determination to<n>make me stronger.
The second spoke<n>of her commitment to working toward<n>
my goal together.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Three days from now, I will ask each<n>of you for your
reasoning again.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I would like you to provide a concrete<n>example of your plan
to me then.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for testing you like this.<n>But I can't make the
decision lightly,<n>you see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I am to stand at the absolute zenith,<n>as a guiding light to all
Umamusume.<n>That is the mission I've given myself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I'm to reach such lofty heights, I<n>can't afford to
compromise.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well, then. We will meet again three<n>days hence. I look
forward to your<n>answer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And as the last words leave her lips,<n>Rudolf looks straight
into my eyes with<n>a calm, composed smile.
